REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1565 reute r f BC-BIOTECHNOLOGY-<BIOD> 03-23 0044

TEXT.TITLE: BIOTECHNOLOGY <BIOD> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY:
Biotechnology Development Corp said its board extended its Class A common stock purchase warrants by six months. The warrants were due to expire June 5 and will now expire on December 5, 1987.
Reuter
